record.title: AUTHORIZING THE CLERK TO MAKE CORRECTIONS IN ENGROSSMENT OF H.R. 2895, NATIONAL AFFORDABLE HOUSING TRUST FUND ACT OF 2007
record.narrative:
AUTHORIZING THE CLERK TO MAKE CORRECTIONS IN ENGROSSMENT OF H.R. 2895, NATIONAL AFFORDABLE HOUSING TRUST FUND ACT OF 2007 -- (House of Representatives - October 10, 2007)

[Page: H11446]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that the Clerk be authorized to make technical corrections in the engrossment of H.R. 2895, to include corrections in spelling, punctuation, section numbering and cross-referencing, and the insertion of appropriate headings.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Georgia?
